name: Flick Soccer League: Football Shoot Kick
name_original: Flick Soccer League: Football Shoot Kick
description:
Flickshot – Soccer Cup is a real football game evolution with fast paced soccer action. No. 1 mobile football 2019 game. Enjoy mobile soccer league!

- Your favorite free soccer simulation is here with modern features and realistic soccer physics. It’s time to build and manage your dream team and lead them to become champion of world cup. Acquire team facilities, recruit star players, improve players abilities, challenge against world cup’s best teams.
- Flickshot – Soccer Cup is the football master with innovative gameplay, intriguing and intense offline football manage game. Be the first football manager by buiding your own football club in this Soccer Cup.
- Challenge the football community in this Flickshot Soccer Cup game. Hit the targets in goal in fast paced time limited soccer battles. You can become both Striker and goalkeeper in this best football 2019. Don’t forget to enjoy Free Kick Mode in this Flick Soccer Game.
- Get ready for a new soccer cup of top quality football action in this euro champion league. You can get many soccer and you can start any football tournament as well as champion league of euro.
- This soccer game 2019 has various modes, including euro champion league, soccer cup, friendly match, penalty match and much more. You can get football training to improve your skills in this best football 2019.

MANAGE YOUR SOCCER TEAM
Hire best soccer stars to create your own dream team to win soccer cup! Chose your team, perfect your style and get real time training before any champion league. Beat world cup teams in all 6 leagues and get top on the prestigious cup. Do you have what it takes to be best football 2019 player?

LIFELIKE NEW SOCCER GAMEPLAY
Get ready for smart, tactical AI to form a challenging and addictive experience in this Flickshot – Soccer Cup. With realistic visuals, real football physics and realistic animation and 60 plus fps dynamic gameplay you can become the first best footballer of this soccer simulator 2019. Flickshot – Soccer cup is perfect soccer package which gives true essence of beautiful game.

COMPETE FOR THE SOCCER CUP
This Flickshot champion league puts your soccer dreams against the best football teams of world. Practice your way through the ranks to improve your favorite tea. Take part in regular events which will pit your team against the best teams.


KEY FEATURES:

• Make perfect soccer shots with flick of finger!
• Play offline soccer 2019 and free kick modes!
• Play against world’s best teams
• 6+ euro champion leagues
• Practice your way to win all matches in soccer cup
• Manage your favorite team! Play as champion leagues
• Upgrade your team, buy new soccer and improve skills
• Fast paced gameplay with actions all the time

BUILD YOUR SOCCER TEAM
It’s time to build your favorite soccer team to win against the league cup. Let your team take practice of soccer match games in a way to euro soccer league. Learn football and then participate in football league by learning and practicing real football challenges. This is a world football mobile game with unique features and interesting soccer challenge.

WORLD CLASS AI PERFORMANCE
The whole football action is boosted by leading and powerful AI football game engine promising realistic football game, most realistic passes, crosses, kicks and dribbles. Flawless gameplay of Flickshot – Soccer Cup gives you real football experiences... Each Time. Every Time.!!

POWERFUL GAMEPLAY
Flickshot – Soccer Cup is offering world class gameplay of mobile soccer game. Immersive 3D graphics of real cup soccer makes it better as it gets. You can now coach your favorite team and lead that team to real cup soccer league. Pick your favorite Indian football 2019 and make a best soccer challenge.

This app is an offline football game. Enjoy the Beautiful game anytime and anywhere. Most amazing feature of this game is Russia Football used in this game to win against the best team of Iran Football league.
